item.title: (Hu)go Template Primer
item.description: Hugo uses the excellent go html/template library for its template engine. It is an extremely lightweight engine that provides a very small amount of logic. In our experience that it is just the right amount of logic to be able to create a good static website. If you have used other template systems from different languages or frameworks you will find a lot of similarities in go templates. This document is a brief primer on using go templates.

item.title: Vijay Kodam
item.description: My name is Vijay Kodam, and this is my personal blog. Currently working as a Principal Engineer Cloud Technology at Nokia, Finland. Started developing software for 2G CDMA in my first job, then moved onto 3G 1x-EVDO RNC development. After that wrote code to deploy 4G/5G Virtual Network Functions on Telco Cloud using open source software like Openstack, Mesos and Docker Containers. Currently working on building and maintaining bare metal cloud platform using Kubernetes, Istio, Docker, CoreOS, Ambassador, and Harbor.
